name: sfchronicle
text:
A mix of arid conditions and the threat of gusty offshore winds in the coming days had meteorologists considering the idea of issuing a red flag warning — signaling a critical fire threat — in December for parts of Northern California.

via @SteveRubeSF: https://t.co/PPRII2TAhq

name: sfchronicle
text: #Warriors’ season hinges on @StephenCurry30’s ability to hold back Father Time. https://t.co/dTUP6eCpZ8

name: sfchronicle
text: Stanford head coach David Shaw said Wednesday that his players emphatically agreed that they should play and it was up to the school’s administration to see if it was possible. https://t.co/93R4oRp5D4

name: sfchronicle
text:
#SFGiants keep outfielder Dickerson, avoid salary arbitration with one-year, $2.1 million deal.

Story by @HankSchulman: https://t.co/IMiieFCmrZ

name: sfchronicle
text:
RT @SFC_Datebook: Those who live outside gender and sexuality norms perhaps know more about grief than the rest of us do. By serving “Holiday Sauce” two new ways in 2020, Taylor Mac offers the gift of wisdom. 

Read @LilyJaniak's latest column here: https://t.co/6hwRTiXRAY

name: sfchronicle
text: These aren’t just traditional jelly donuts: Instead, they’re dolled up with incredible toppings like meringue kisses, amaretti cookies and crunchy chocolate pearls, and filled with anything from chocolate ganache to pistachio cream. https://t.co/ESr5vTv0qc

name: sfchronicle
text: RT @hankschulman: #SFGiants and Austin Slater have settled at $1.15 million.

name: sfchronicle
text: We're under a curfew in portions of the Bay Area as part of increased protocols to limit the spread of the coronavirus. Columnist @justmrphillips understands why this is necessary. But as a Black man, he's concerned. Here's why: https://t.co/mO9z6bdOVo

name: sfchronicle
text:
Bay Area hospitals are bracing for a wave of coronavirus patients as cases surge in the state, but say the region is better prepared to handle the swell than many other areas due to its cautious response to the pandemic.

Story by @NanetteAsimov: https://t.co/wcA00jS9Kn
